column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I love ramen. I don't love JINYA. Although the service was prompt and kind
column2: the food was lacking. I got the spicy tonkotsu and the broth was the wrong kind of spicy (I'm a spicy person)... the kind that gives you heartburns and regret. The soup was fatty and greasy- not creamy and spicy like it should be. The noodles were pretty good
column3: kind of had bite. The combination of toppings that come with the soup didn't round out the soup like they should. Expensive too. Don't waste your time at this place- there are better ramen restaurants to try in Houston
